description:
In the midst of their journey to the ruins, Zatch, Kiyo, Megumi, Tia, and Ponygon run into Kanchome and Folgore, who were also convinced by Dr. Riddles to join in the quest to defeat Milordo-Z. Together they proceed into the ruins where they encounter Gel
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breaking into Deboro`s Ruins! Kanchome`s Battle!!
突入デボロ遺跡! キャンチョメ大作戦!!
